noCameraFound: No camera device found, please ensure virtual camera is started
cameraPermissionDenied: Camera access denied, please check system permission settings
cameraInUse: Camera is in use by another application, please close the application using the camera
cameraAborted: Camera access aborted, please try again later
connectingVirtualCamera: Attempting to connect to virtual camera:
virtualCameraFailed: Virtual camera connection failed, trying other cameras...
tryingOtherCamera: Attempting to connect to alternative camera:
noVirtualCameraFound: No virtual camera found, trying available cameras...
browserNotSupported: Your browser does not support camera access
permissionHelpMessage: Please follow these steps to resolve the permission issue:
permissionHelpStep1: 1. Ensure this app is allowed to access the camera in system settings
permissionHelpStep2: 2. Check if virtual camera is started
permissionHelpStep3: 3. Make sure no other applications are exclusively using the camera
permissionHelpStep4: 4. Try reloading the app or restarting your computer
